pages.text: $(thing)Cannons$() are the third sub-class of $(l:aoa3:guns#guns)guns$(/l), offering increased fire power in exchange for more expensive ammunition and a slower fire rate.$(br)$(thing)Cannons$() also offer additional damage against armoured targets, disable shields if the target is blocking with one, and pushes targets back when struck.
pages.title: Cannons

pages.text: Think of $(thing)cannons$() as the big brother of $(l:aoa3:guns#guns)guns$(/l), working the same way but dishing out much more damage per shot, and hitting defensive targets $(o)hard$().$(br2)Where $(thing)guns$() might be used for multiple weaker targets, or to dish out rapid damage, $(thing)cannons$() act as the ranged-equivalent of a $(l:aoa3:mauls#mauls)maul$(/l), blowing targets away.
Blow your enemies away with these oversized shooty-sticks.
pages.title: A Cannon

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)cannons$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
